titleStmt.title: A divine tragedie lately acted, or, A collection of sundrie memorable examples of Gods judgements upon Sabbath-breakers, and other like libertines, in their unlawfull sports, hapning within the realme of England, in the compasse onely of few yeers last past, since the book was published, worthy to be known and considered of all men, especially such, who are guilty of the sin or archpatrons thereof. / By that worthy divine Mr. Henry Burton.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
Prynne, William, 1600-1669, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [for John Wright junior, and for Tho. Bates, and are to be sold at their shops in the Old Baylie],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication, booksellers' names and location, and actual date of publication from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shops in the Old Baylie]
